pullRequest.title: Marketplace improvements and fixes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Detailed description:

Add post installation notes to provide guidance on how to connect to the mirror node
Add pre installation help widget with information on how to obtain requester pays credentials
Change from PostgreSQL 11 to 12
Change to auto generation of passwords
Change network selection to drop-down
Fix PostgreSQL docker image broken on initial start by reverting to a known working version
Fix REST configuration accepting environment variables that don't start with HEDERA_MIRROR_REST_
Fix REST configuration accepting environment variables with extra path elements

Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Special notes for your reviewer:
Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated

commit.message:
Marketplace improvement and fixes

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

nodes.bodyText: Will this get updated per release by the replacer module?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,16 +1,17 @@
 #!/usr/bin/env bash
 set -ex
 
-if [[ "$#" -ne 1 ]]; then
-  echo "You must provide the Mirror Node image tag"
+if [[ "$#" -lt 1 ]]; then
+  echo "You must provide the Mirror Node image tag (e.g. 0.14.0)"
   exit 1
 fi
 
-tag="${1}"
+tag="${1#v}" # Strip v prefix if present
 tag_minor="${tag%\.*}"
-bats_tag="latest"
-postgresql_tag="latest"
-registry="gcr.io/mirror-node-public/hedera-mirror-node"
+source_tag="0.13.2"
